"}],"theme":"light","padding":"","spacing":"20","component":"section","isAnimated":false,"px_padding":"","full_height":true},{"id":"v1","_uid":"bf3aa983-54be-42db-87af-3868113ea1b5","main":[{"_uid":"b178f0fa-7f2b-4033-bd45-cd47e3572769","text":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Gaming is a real passion of mine and I have been able to work in gaming, most professional game projects I worked was shortly after graduating 2:1 Ba Hons in game design in 2012.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"After graduating all those years ago I spent some time working on indie projects with a couple of releases, but mostly passion projects.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"One of the released apps was released way back in 2013 and was a puzzle game set in a zombie infested London.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"I also created Bubble Cat, which I must finish one day...","type":"text"}]}]},"alignment":"left","component":"header","isScrolling":false,"header_items":[],"animatedTitle":""},{"_uid":"0fc7c263-f6c4-459d-83d3-9320745df10f","columns":[{"_uid":"ed20e6b3-c398-43c8-a3fe-fd2907ceed67","image":{"id":10298293,"alt":"Bubble cat -
